name: Honesty Impact
effect: [Main] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −4000 power during this turn. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 power or less.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 power or less.

trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 power or less.

name: Glorp Web!!
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.

name: X Calibur
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.

name: Ancient Weapon Poseidon
effect: [Main] Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Neptunian} or {Fish-Man Island} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Gum-Gum Elephant Gatling
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.
[Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Vagabond Drill
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

name: Gum-Gum King Cobra
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 4 or less cards in your hand, that card gains an additional +2000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less to the owner's hand.

name: Let's Crash This Wedding!!!
effect: [Main] If your Leader is multicolored, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} type card other than [Let's Crash This Wedding!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Gum-Gum Jet Culverin
effect: [Main] Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 4 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.
trigger: [Trigger] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

name: When Two Men Are Fighting the Last Thing I Need Is Some Half-Hearted Assistance!!!!
effect: [Counter] Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +5000 power during this battle.

name: Gear Two
effect:
[Main] You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader's colors include blue, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
[Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Gear Two
effect:

name: Cognac Mama-Mash
effect: [Main] Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 8 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: After All These Years I'm Losing My Edge!!!
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 10 or more cards in your trash, add up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your trash to your hand.

name: Blue Hole
effect: [Main] You may trash 3 cards from the top of your deck: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.

name: I'm Gonna Be a Navy Officer!!!
effect: [Main] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [I'm Gonna Be a Navy Officer!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

name: Gum-Gum Fire-Fist Pistol Red Hawk
effect:
[Main] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: If you and your opponent have a total of 5 or more Life cards, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 5 or less.
[Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: You're Just Not My Type!

trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

name: Merman Combat Ultramarine
effect: [Main] Add up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up.
trigger: [Trigger] Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up.
